```{r child_sidebar2}
## choose genes
radioButtons("ess_gen_clust",h4("Search:"),
  choices=c("gene","pathway","cluster"),
  selected="gene")

conditionalPanel("input.ess_gen_clust == 'gene'",
  pickerInput(
  	inputId = "eid2",
  	label = h4("Gene:"),
  	choices = eids.ess,
  	options = list(`live-search` = TRUE)))

conditionalPanel("input.ess_gen_clust == 'pathway'",
  pickerInput(
  	inputId = "path2",
  	label = h4("Pathway:"),
  	choices = nm.msigdb.ess,
  	options = list(`live-search` = TRUE)))

conditionalPanel("input.ess_gen_clust == 'cluster'",
  pickerInput(
  	inputId = "clust2",
  	label = h4("Cluster:"),
  	choices = 1:180,
  	options = list(`live-search` = FALSE)))


## highlight cluster by some colors

## 0. sidebar (highlight)
HTML("<hr>")

sliderInput("lik2",h5("Cluster consistency (Likelihood):"),
  min=0,max=1,value=0)

selectInput("color_code2",h5("Color coded by:"),
  choices=c("density","efficacy","selectivity"),
  selected="selectivity")

```

```{r child_reactive2, context="server"}
igenclust2 <- reactive(input$ess_gen_clust) ## gene, orthogroup
ieid2 <- reactive(input$eid2)
ipath2 <- reactive(input$path2)
iclust2 <- reactive(input$clust2)
icolor2 <- reactive(input$color_code2)
ilik2 <- reactive(input$lik2)

ief2 <- reactive({
  if(is.null(input$eid2)){
    NULL
  }else{
    s3readRDS(paste0("ef_ess/",input$eid2,".rds"),bucket="depmap")
  }
})

icoef2 <- reactive({
  if(is.null(input$eid2)){
    NULL
  }else{
      s3readRDS(paste0("coef_ess/",input$eid2,".rds"),bucket="depmap")
  }
})

igs2 <- reactive({
  if(is.null(input$path2)){
    NULL
  }else{
    s3readRDS(paste0("msigdb_ess/",input$path2,".rds"),bucket="depmap")
  }
})
```
